entries.meaning: (of humans or other animals) The state of being sexually or romantically attracted to members of either sex or gender.
(chiefly botany) The state of being bisexual (“having both male and female parts or roles”).
examples: Recall from earlier in this paper that H. longicornis consists of obligatory bisexual diploid races (20+XX 0; 20+X)  […]  and variance is obscured because of the simultaneous variables of method of reproduction (bisexuality vs. thelytoky) and   […]
